name: Strategy game but with a penguin who has a sword
name_original: Strategy game but with a penguin who has a sword
description:
A cozy tactics rougelite game with good lofi hip hop music.



You are just chilling when a secret door opens to your basement. But there are lots of monsters!

Take your father's Teleport Sword. Find out where he disappeared long ago.
Will you be able to reach the 100th floor and find out the surprising truth?

Features

  • Turn-based strategy battles
  • Obtain special abilities, like the Teleport Attack
  • Infinite replayability + 50 hand-designed levels
  • Customization: Buy new skins, outfits and swords
  • Find out the story about your father's disappearance and the monsters' origin
  • Good Lofi hip hop music
  • Ideal to play while listening to something
